'''Ms. Yu''' {{Lang|zh=小雨|zh_rm=Xiǎo Yǔ}} is a Secretary of the [[Ministry of Civil Affairs]], Liyue, and the reputation advisor for [[Liyue Harbor]]. She is located in the Harbor area of [[Chihu Rock]].

She gives the [[World Quest]] ''[[Ministry Missions]]'', which unlocks Liyue's [[Reputation]] menu. She can be found under the {{DIcon|Reputation}} icon on the map.

==Profile==
{{Quote
|A public servant attached to the Ministry of Civil Affairs. She seems to be quite knowledgeable about the flow of goods in and out of the harbor as well as the latest rumors circulating on the streets.<br />Increasing your Reputation in Liyue might be just the key you need to gain her trust.|World Map description
}}

Ms. Yu is a resource manager with the Ministry of Civil Affairs, Liyue, and takes on the role of Secretary. Her work includes the management of material goods, information and human resources.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Reputation Level 1–2)
:'''Ms. Yu:''' Hello there. Interested in doing some work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs?
;(Reputation Level 3)
:'''Ms. Yu:''' Hello there, the Ministry of Civil Affairs has some work lined up. I can share the details with you if you're interested.
;(Reputation Level 7)
:'''Ms. Yu:''' Hi, how have you been? There's new work from the Ministry of Civil Affairs. If you've got time to spare, do help us out!
:{{DIcon|Reputation}} How's my reputation in Liyue?
:;(Opens Reputation menu)
:{{DIcon}} Tell me a little about yourself, please...
::'''Ms. Yu:''' My name's Ms. Yu, and I'm a resource manager with the Ministry of Civil Affairs.
::'''Ms. Yu:''' By resource management, we don't just mean the management of material goods. We also manage information and human resources.
::'''Ms. Yu:''' I trust that you, too, understand how important resource management is to a city that prizes commerce as much as Liyue does.
::'''Ms. Yu:''' Exchanging material for manpower and intelligence, and using all three to solve issues &mdash; that's our Ministry's specialty.
::'''Ms. Yu:''' To put it more plainly, you help us, we pay you. Haha! So, how about it?
::'''Ms. Yu:''' Still, the work you can take on is dependent on your reputation. The greater the trust people have in you, the greater the tasks you can take up!
:{{DIcon}} See you later, then.
::'''Ms. Yu:''' See you later. The Ministry thanks you for your kind heart.
{{Dialogue end}}
